name: Circle Drop
description:
I made this game in 3 hours for Trijam #135. The theme was "Circles".

Move your mouse to aim and left click to shoot the balls.

Pegs hit by the balls give you points and will be destroyed after they are hit 3 times. you have 30 balls to destroy all the pegs and win.

Grey Peg: 10 points

Orange Peg: 25 points

Yellow Peg: 50 points
